Blacknight mare::

"Let me companion you" said Blacknighmare"I should find out who was 
TRULY that Daimond"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest frowns, looking around at all the bots saddened by 
KitKat's 
> death. He could understand a bit of regret at losing a leader, but 
> this? This wasn't Predacon.
> 
> "I think we should put her in cryo storage for now," he says, 
nodding 
> to Demise. Demise walks to KitKat and lifts her in one of his huge 
> clawed hands.
> 
> "KitKat shall be honored," he says, looking at DarkMouse, "But can 
we 
> get on with the codes?"
